message: When somebody made a topic earlier, in a group that I'm a part of, I got an email.  It was total spam on their part, but since it was the first message of the topic, I got their entire message, in my inbox, and that felt wrong to me.  It felt like somebody gamed convore into auto-emailing the whole group an announcement about their thing.  That wasn't very fun.

@issackelly Receiving emails on new topic creation is a per-group setting. If you go to the "Group actions" menu in the top right, and then down to "Notification Settings," you can toggle this email on and off.
@michaelschade Yeah, I know.  It just really seems like the way they're done right now invites spam in large public groups.
